title: Bernard-Soulier syndrome
definition: Autosomal recessive quantitative or qualitative defect of the platelet GPIb-IX-V receptor that binds vWF. Impaired platelet-to-vWF adhesion causes mucocutaneous bleeding. Smear shows giant platelets with mild-to-moderate thrombocytopenia.

image.alt: Bernard-Soulier: big platelets and defective adhesion
